metadata.name: Iles Oxyd√©es
metadata.description:
This piece is part of the Plotted Islands generative collection bringing to life imaginary maps through the power of code.

It comes with a physical A3 piece (420mm x 297mm) made with fountain pen inks on watercolor paper.

This token (NFT) is a 1:1 digital version of the physical plot. Each primary sale allows to acquire the physical plot. Please contact @greweb on Twitter or via other socials (see https://greweb.me/) to arrange the shipping.

Upon resale on the secondary market, the original plot shall be shipped to the new owner. Please contact the physical owner directly.
